messages.message:
@Bren Good hint, I started to document my findings here in Confluence: OCR Language Detection (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SALESENG/pages/1536163933/OCR+-+Language+Detection).
@Hari Good it, thanks for the hint. I researched this for ABBYY and it seems like they changed how thinks works under the hood for V10 and V11 of their FineReader Engine (Link (https://support.abbyy.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017680439-OCR-Language-Auto-Detection-in-ABBYY-FineReader-Engine)). Which version are we currently using?
